title: HPI 40 - Mind out of Matter - Materialist Theories of the Self
itunes:title: HPI 40 - Mind out of Matter - Materialist Theories of the Self
description: Pāyasi and the Cārvāka anticipate modern-day theories of mind by arguing that there is no independent soul; rather thought emerges from the body.
content:encoded: Pāyasi and the Cārvāka anticipate modern-day theories of mind by arguing that there is no independent soul; rather thought emerges from the body.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
